name: Kenku
description: Haunted by an ancient crime, the flightless kenku wander the world as servants and scoundrels, cursed to only speak through mimicry.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Expert Forgery
traits.description: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

effects.condition: on checks to produce forgeries or duplicates

traits.name: Kenku Training
traits.description: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth, and Sleight of Hand.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Wisdom (Insight) check.
